attributes.action: Ban Kosher and Halal Butchery and it's Products in Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Halal & Kosher butchery is barbaric and inhumane leading to severe suffering of the animal in the name of religion. It is wrong for our nation to promote these forms of butchery and it must be banned to end all suffering of livestock in the name of religion.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban Kosher and Halal Butchery and it's Products in Britain."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16543


Prime Minister's Office
